So much life lived in only 2 weeks. Songs like Mothers Daughter & Angels Like You were added in spontaneously (Angels was added in the night before the show inspired by the fans below my hotel room singing it all night long)

My ATTENTION South America tour is one I will never forget. Its one of those ‚Äú You just had to be there‚Äù experiences. The fans, the chaos & the pandemonium. The beautiful cultures of the countries I visited. The treacherous travel at times‚Ä¶.  The loss of a friend‚Ä¶. https://t.co/qNFoiVepHH

I love you all more than you‚Äôll ever know. Tonight may be hard but life can be hard. It can also be so beautiful! Let‚Äôs make it beautiful tonight! üåå

Tonights show is in honor of my friend Taylor Hawkins. The most bad ass dude I know who would want me to shine and sing LOUD for the love of rock n roll! I‚Äôve got this with a little help from my friend TH above & all of you. Let‚Äôs do it . ü¶Öüñ§ü§òüèª

I am just feeling heart broken & ‚Äúhuman‚Äù today‚Ä¶. But I am putting on my super hero suit and going to be strong not only for YOU but for ME! I want to live my truth AND MY MESSAGE! Never give up!

My mind wants to run‚Ä¶. But my heart and soul WOULD NEVER leave Brazil without giving you the best show possible. It isn‚Äôt aligned with my values to not stick to my word. I promised you a SHOW & there will be one! There is so much to celebrate and be excited about‚Ä¶

I always feel better when I am honest. To be real I just want tonight‚Äôs show to be PERFECT for you‚Ä¶ but I know none of you have ever loved me for being perfect ‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs actually been the opposite. You‚Äôve loved me thru all of my past struggles and I know you‚Äôll support me now. üñ§

Brazil ‚Ä¶. I‚Äôve had a really emotionally and physically stressful last few days. After having altitude sickness, my plane was struck by lightening & the first person I spoke to after the flight has now passed away‚Ä¶ when I got to where I was going I had bronchitis!
